snippet: Blackstone’s huge gain on its Hilton investment might at first glance look like a multibillion-dollar loss. | Bank of America agreed to pay a $131.8 million penalty over the structuring and sale of two complex mortgage securities. | Silicon Valley...
abstract: Blackstone’s huge gain on its Hilton investment might at first glance look like a multibillion-dollar loss. | Bank of America agreed to pay a $131.8 million penalty over the structuring and sale of two complex mortgage securities. | Silicon Valley is increasing its real money bets on Bitcoin.

headline.main: How Blackstone Made Money on Hilton
